concept.title: Breakfast Hash
concept.shortdesc: This meal works for breakfast, lunch, dinner and everything in between!

conbody.p: A Breakfast Hash is a great meal to make when your refrigerator is filled with leftovers that you would like to use. The staple of the Breakfast Hash is potatoes, and you can choose other toppings you would like to add. A Breakfast Hash is a more savory meal, so if you don't have a sweet tooth this is the meal for you!
